Articles.Content: Maybe we're getting a 3.75 m capsule? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

My personal guesses as to Valentina Kerman's attributes if shes a starting kerbal.

Profession: Pilot (Makes sense from a gameplay standpoint, newbie friendly. You get two chances with pilots, so two times to figure out how to recruit more)

BadS: (possibly, on one hand, pilot. on other, Jeb has secured his place as supreme-BadS forever, so yes or no)

Courage: probably high

Stupidity: probably low-mid
I just hope this isn't the only fem kerbal. They should be among the ground techs and engineers, and admin, R&D, and mission control too!
I really like the look of Valentina! I think she turned out great!
Perfect !!!
I really like how it turned out! You guys did a great job!

Valentina Kerman has already gone missing after frequent complaints that she's become too famous.

In other news, a new kerbal has been admitted into the space program.

![P10anjp.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/P10anjp.jpg)

A generic female Kerbal. Definitely not a famous politician astronaut. No, her name does not even SLIGHTLY resemble that of a Moon of Jool. Totally different person than the one you're thinking of.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Maybe we're getting a 3.75 m capsule? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

We already have one! The Mk3 Cockpit! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

My only critique would be the hairline, it looks a little plain or abrupt - maybe a curl or wave would spice it up; or it could just be the angle of the shot.
FANTASTIC!! Spot on art and design here Squad, well done!!!

Wait. I hear Jeb making fun of people again.

"Boys go to school to be more cool. Girls go to Jool because they're so dumb they drool!"

Valentina remarks with a considerably geekier reference to classic science fiction story (2001: A Space Odyssey).

"Girls go to college to get more knowledge, boys go to Jupiter to get more stupider!"

Bob bursts into the fight, showing an XKCD comic to break the tension.

"Girls go to college to get more knowledge. Boys go to college to get more knowledge. Boys and Girls go to Jupiter."

He handed them [the comic](http://xkcd.com/1202/).

"To get more knowledge."

Bill continues to go to Jool, because he's so stupid all he can do is drool.

Gus continues to go to Gilly to steal more chilli from the fridge. (Yeah, haven't you guys noticed that Gus is always really suspicious whenever we mention the lunch thief?)

Walt goes to Pol, 'cause he's a troll.

Linus goes to Eve, for a bit of relief.

Gene goes to Mun, because his burgers need some buns.

It's worth noting that in the Kerbal Universe, XKCD is the producers of xenon-gas for thrusters, and thus actually has an acronym. Xenon from Kerbin's Clouds, Department. They also have a successful comic book series chronicling the lives and times of the air-miners of their workforce. A significant portion of stranded orbiting Kerbals come from workers munlighting at XKCD and using their xenon-collector packs too much. The rest come from Kerbals inexplicably trapped under the ropes of launching test rockets.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-21T03:09:41Z" title="02/21/2015 03:09  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 21, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**
Very nice model there.

> 
> Hooray! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Having only male kerbals always seemed weird. By the way, I notice she has an orange suit: will she replace one of the original trio?
> -Duxwing

It will probably become a quartet. Or perhaps a sextet, if they decide to add two more orange-suited females to balance things out.

I think Squad hit the nail on the head with this model. She's distinctly female, but also distinctly kerbal. Cute without being oversexualized. And they definitely did what they were intending to do as far as making her "as disposable as the guy kerbals." Plus her pose is great!

> 
> We already have one! The Mk3 Cockpit! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

That's not a capsule. It's not symmetrical, blunt object for reentry. It would be good to have a proper large capsule...

She looks nice! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

She seems to be a bit smaller than a male Kerbal and also more slim. I think that's good enough to easily see the difference. I would like to see a picture with the whole orange crew. Make it 20 Megapixels so we can make a poster out of it. ^^
Maybe Frizzank is redoing ALL the IVAs, and the Mk1-2 pod will be getting a 4-Kerbal crew.
My daughter approves. She looks great, guys.
Amazing work!
Wow. Looks great! Good job guys!

> 
> We never had any spinoff memes about specific Kerbals, and we are sure as heck not gonna start now!

I don't know about that; Jeb is *the* original KSP meme:

![x7oMvWJ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/x7oMvWJ.jpg)

Wow, I wasn't expecting quality work from squad.![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

On an ever so slightly more serious note, this is really good work, and I love how Valentina looks. Keep up the excellent work squad.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-21T04:45:21Z" title="02/21/2015 04:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 21, 2015</time> by Space\_Kraken**
  
Typo
Love it. Perfect!

Bravo!

She looks like exactly what I expected, no-lipstick-for-the-win!

Love you Squad!

> 
> Maybe Frizzank is redoing ALL the IVAs, and the Mk1-2 pod will be getting a 4-Kerbal crew.

That would be very acceptable.

It looks terrible. You clearly put no time into this and I hope to never see any more of her.

jk, jk. I like it too, but with all the positive comments and praise in this thread I was afraid it'd reach critical mass and turn into a happy black hole. ;P
